Hello I'm David
Front-end developer & part-time hockey player from London

I like making things on the web View my portfolio or Follow me on Github

This site is responsive - Built on the omega boilerplate and held together with Drupal. The main typeface is droid-sans, the logo uses bebas.

A self confessed hockey nut, you'll see me running about at the weekends for Barnes HC.

Skills

Front-end Development

I write clean, hand-coded HTML and CSS, I also have strong jQuery knowledge.

Content managment systems

I have over 3 years' experience using Drupal and have used Wordpress and Magento too.

UX Design

User Experience is a crucial part of my workflow, from research through to development.

Mobile web apps

I build responsive web sites from the ground up, keeping a close eye on the latest trends.

Version Control

Active member of the Github community follow me and I use svn on a daily basis.

Web optimisation

I have good knowledge of page speed optimisation, and some SEO skills.
